China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 9 日星期五 12:41:25 GMT 120
Greece to raise investment price for 'golden visas', PM saysGreece is planning to further raise the investment threshold for "golden visas" to foreigners to 800,000 euros ($861,520) for real estate in cities and islands where demand is high, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:32:00 GMT W3GTAPFTQJIKBC2CBR4JZJWHF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greece-raise-investment-price-golden-visas-pm-says-2024-02-09/Reuters世界欧洲
Investors dumped U.S. shares, bought China in week to Wednesday - BofAInvestors dumped U.S. and real estate shares and bought Chinese stocks in the week to Wednesday, a report from Bank of America citing data from EPFR said on Friday, saying the China flows were likely driven by Chinese public funds. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:25:06 GMT 2RPQLEWRSAATBVRLHI https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-market-flows-bofa-update-1-2024-02-09/Reuters市场ETF
Philippines says joint exercises held with U.S. in S. China SeaThe Philippines and the United States conducted joint maritime exercises in the South China Sea on Friday, the Philippine military said, the latest round of drills underlining ongoing expansion of their defence ties. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:20:48 GMT 4GGJZFVJGFPMLA6YZQ4YPPODXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-says-joint-exercises-successful-with-us-china-sea-2024-02-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Asia Gold India flips to premium, Lunar New Year sparks buying in other hubsPhysical gold dealers in India charged premiums this week for the first time in four months encouraged by a pick-up in purchases as local prices eased, while the approaching Lunar New Year festival boosted activity in China and elsewhere. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:12:50 GMT QQPKO4TZMJMOHGKTXLDZJFSSTI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/asia-gold-india-flips-premium-lunar-new-year-sparks-buying-other-hubs-2024-02-09/Rajendra Jadhav, Harshit Verma市场商品
Morning Bid: Record Wall St holds, inflation revision eyedA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:03:22 GMT YQXKKL4G7ZM3FF5FCT6TFE2VSU https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-09/Reuters市场美国市场
China's consumer slump claims another victim as Shiseido profit slidesShiseido became the latest victim on Friday of a slowing Chinese economy that has battered earnings at many global consumer goods companies, when the Japanese cosmetics maker reported a 40% slide in annual earnings. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:45:16 GMT XLIPPJXMKVPWRCVJ6HIXWFMJAM https://www.reuters.com/business/consumer-retail/chinese-consumer-slump-claims-another-victim-shiseido-profit-slides-2024-02-09/Rocky Swift商业零售与消费品
